alert.note: Alert for Becker; Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 8:29AM CDT until May 09 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Otter Tail County in west central Minnesota... Becker County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 915 AM CDT. * At 829 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Edwards, or 9 miles north of Fergus Falls, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Edwards and Erhard around 830 AM CDT. Maplewood State Park and Lake Lida around 835 AM CDT. Star Lake around 840 AM CDT. Big McDonald Lake and Dunvilla around 845 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Vergas and Shoreham. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota near mile marker 46. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
